data.title: Fujitsu - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Fujitsu has acquired 16 companies, including 3 in the last 5 years. A total of 6 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 6 assets.
                Fujitsu’s largest acquisition to date was in 2009, when it acquired KAZ Group Pty for $200M. Fujitsu has acquired in 6 different US states, and 7 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include information technology (36%) and  software (15%).
data.text:
Fujitsu M&A Summary

Fujitsu has acquired 16 companies, including 3 in the last 5 years. A total of 6 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 6 assets.

Fujitsu’s largest acquisition to date was in 2009, when it acquired KAZ Group Pty for $200M. Fujitsu has acquired in 6 different US states, and 7 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include information technology (36%) and software (15%).

Fujitsu Business Overview
